table.name: sp_units
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `sp_units` ( `unitid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `unit_no` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `unitname` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `usageunit` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `unit_code` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`unitid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: sp_unitscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `sp_unitscf` ( `unitid` int(19) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`unitid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
